body.p: Entities implementing IFRS 17 expressed the following concerns about mutual entities:

li.p: applying IFRS 17 as described in paragraph BC265 would result in a misleading depiction of the financial position and financial performance of an entity with the feature that the most residual interest of the entity is due to a policyholder; and
some entities described in practice as mutual entities do not have the feature that the most residual interest of the entity is due to a policyholder.
